   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_private_message/1,
   36:          muc_deny_private_room_access/1,
   37:          muc_allow_access_to_owner/1,
   38:          muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms/1,
   39:          range_archive_request/1,
   40:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   41:          limit_archive_request/1,
   42:          prefs_set_request/1,
   43:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   44:          pagination_first5/1,
   45:          pagination_last5/1,
   46:          pagination_before10/1,
   47:          pagination_after10/1,
   48:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   49:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   50:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   51:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   52:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   53:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   54:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   55:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   56:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   57:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   58:          archived/1,
   59:          strip_archived/1,
   60:          filter_forwarded/1,
   61:          policy_violation/1,
   62:          offline_message/1,
   63:          nostore_hint/1,
   64:          purge_single_message/1,
   65:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   66:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   67:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   68:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   69:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   70:          run_prefs_cases/1,
   71:          run_set_and_get_prefs_cases/1]).
   72: 
   73: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   74: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   75: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   76: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   77: 
   78: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   79:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   80:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   81:     )).
   82: 
   83: -define(assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   84:     [ct:fail("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   85:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   86:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   87:     )).
   88: 
   89: -define(_assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   90:     [ct:pal("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   91:             [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   92:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   93:     )).
   94: 
   95: -record(rsm_in, {
   96:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   97:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
   98:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
   99:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  100:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
  101:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
  102:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
  103:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
  104:         simple = false :: boolean(),
  105:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
  106:         }).
  107: 
  108: -record(forwarded_message, {
  109:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
  110:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
  111:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
  112:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
  113:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
  114:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
  115:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
  116:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  117:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined,
  118:     has_x_user_element :: boolean()
  119: }).
  120: 
  121: -record(result_iq, {
  122:     from            :: binary(),
  123:     to              :: binary(),
  124:     id              :: binary(),
  125:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  126:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  127:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  128:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  129: }).
  130: 
  131: -record(error_iq, {
  132:     id              :: binary(),
  133:     type            :: binary(),
  134:     error_type      :: binary(),
  135:     condition       :: binary(),
  136:     text            :: binary()
  137: }).
  138: 
  139: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  140:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  141:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  142:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  143: }).
  144: 
  145: 
  146: -record(mam_archive_respond, {
  147:           respond_messages,
  148:           respond_iq,
  149:           respond_fin
  150:          }).
  151: 
  152: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  153: %% Suite configuration
  154: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  155: 
  156: muc_host() ->
  157:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  158: 
  159: host() ->
  160:     <<"localhost">>.
  161: 
  162: configurations() ->
  163:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  164:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  165: 
  166: odbc_configs(true) ->
  167:     [odbc,
  168:      odbc_simple,
  169:      odbc_async_pool,
  170:      odbc_mnesia,
  171:      odbc_async_cache,
  172:      odbc_cache,
  173:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  174:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  175: odbc_configs(_) ->
  176:     [].
  177: 
  178: riak_configs(true) ->
  179:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  180: riak_configs(_) ->
  181:      [].
  182: 
  183: basic_group_names() ->
  184:     [
  185:     mam,
  186:     mam03,
  187:     mam04,
  188:     mam_purge,
  189:     muc,
  190:     muc03,
  191:     muc04,
  192:     muc_with_pm,
  193:     rsm,
  194:     rsm03,
  195:     rsm04,
  196:     with_rsm,
  197:     with_rsm03,
  198:     with_rsm04,
  199:     muc_rsm,
  200:     muc_rsm03,
  201:     muc_rsm04,
  202:     bootstrapped,
  203:     archived,
  204:     policy_violation,
  205:     nostore,
  206:     prefs_cases
  207:     ].
  208: 
  209: all() ->
  210:     Reasons =
  211:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  212:         false -> [require_odbc];
  213:         true  -> []
  214:     end,
  215:     case Reasons of
  216:         [] ->
  217:             tests();
  218:         [_|_] ->
  219:             {skip, Reasons}
  220:     end.
  221: 
  222: tests() ->
  223:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  224:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  225:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  226: 
  227: groups() ->
  228:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  229:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  230:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  231: 
  232: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  233:     false.
  234: 
  235: 
  236: basic_groups() ->
  237:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  238:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  239:      {mam03,            [], mam_cases()},
  240:      {mam04,            [], mam_cases()},
  241:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  242:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  243:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  244:      {nostore,          [], nostore_cases()},
  245:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  246:      {muc03,            [], muc_cases()},
  247:      {muc04,            [], muc_cases()},
  248:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  249:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  250:      {rsm03,            [], rsm_cases()},
  251:      {rsm04,            [], rsm_cases()},
  252:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  253:      {muc_rsm03,        [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  254:      {muc_rsm04,        [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  255:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()},
  256:      {with_rsm03,       [], with_rsm_cases()},
  257:      {with_rsm04,       [], with_rsm_cases()},
  258:      {prefs_cases,      [], prefs_cases()}].
  259: 
  260: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  261:      [purge_old_single_message,
  262:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  263: 
  264: mam_cases() ->
  265:     [mam_service_discovery,
  266:      simple_archive_request,
  267:      range_archive_request,
  268:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  269:      limit_archive_request].
  270: 
  271: mam_purge_cases() ->
  272:     [purge_single_message,
  273:      purge_multiple_messages].
  274: 
  275: archived_cases() ->
  276:     [archived,
  277:      strip_archived,
  278:      filter_forwarded].
  279: 
  280: policy_violation_cases() ->
  281:     [policy_violation].
  282: 
  283: nostore_cases() ->
  284:     [offline_message,
  285:      nostore_hint].
  286: 
  287: muc_cases() ->
  288:     [muc_service_discovery,
  289:      muc_archive_request,
  290:      muc_archive_purge,
  291:      muc_multiple_devices,
  292:      muc_private_message,
  293:      muc_deny_private_room_access,
  294:      muc_allow_access_to_owner,
  295:      muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms,
  296:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  297:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  298:      ].
  299: 
  300: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  301:     rsm_cases().
  302: 
  303: with_rsm_cases() ->
  304:     rsm_cases().
  305: 
  306: rsm_cases() ->
  307:       [pagination_first5,
  308:        pagination_last5,
  309:        pagination_before10,
  310:        pagination_after10,
  311:        pagination_empty_rset,
  312:        %% Border cases
  313:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  314:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  315:        %% Simple cases
  316:        pagination_simple_before10,
  317:        %% opt_count cases
  318:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  319:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  320:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  321:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  322:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  323:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  324:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  325: 
  326: prefs_cases() ->
  327:     [prefs_set_request,
  328:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  329:      run_prefs_cases,
  330:      run_set_and_get_prefs_cases].
  331: 
  332: suite() ->
  333:     escalus:suite().
  334: 
  335: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  336:     disable_shaping(
  337:       delete_users([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  338:                   | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)])).
  339: 
  340: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  341:     escalus:end_per_suite(restore_shaping(Config)).
  342: 
  343: user_names() ->
  344:     [alice, bob, kate].
  345: 
  346: create_users(Config) ->
  347:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  348: 
  349: delete_users(Config) ->
  350:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}),
  351:     Config.
  352: 
  353: disable_shaping(Config) ->
  354:     OldShaper = get_shaper(),
  355:     set_shaper({{maxrate, 100}, {maxrate, 10000000}, {maxrate, 10000000}}),
  356:     [{old_mam_shaper, OldShaper}|Config].
  357: 
  358: restore_shaping(Config) ->
  359:     OldShaper = proplists:get_value(old_mam_shaper, Config),
  360:     set_shaper(OldShaper),
  361:     Config.
  362: 
  363: get_shaper() ->
  364:     Mam = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}]),
  365:     Norm = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, normal, global}]),
  366:     Fast = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, fast, global}]),
  367:     {Mam, Norm, Fast}.
  368: 
  369: set_shaper({Mam, Norm, Fast}) ->
  370:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}, Mam]),
  371:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, normal, global}, Norm]),
  372:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, fast, global}, Fast]),
  373:     rpc_apply(shaper_srv, reset_all_shapers, [host()]).
  374: 
  375: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  376:    C = configuration(Group),
  377:    B = basic_group(Group),
  378:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  379:         skip ->
  380:             {skip, print_configuration_not_supported(C, B)};
  381:         Config0 ->
  382:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  383:                    [Group, C, B]),
  384:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  385:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  386:     end.
  387: 
  388: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  389:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  390:     case C of
  391:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  392:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  393:         _ ->
  394:             Config0
  395:     end.
  396: 
  397: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  398:     delete_users(Config),
  399:     C = configuration(Group),
  400:     B = basic_group(Group),
  401:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  402: 
  403: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  404:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  405: init_modules(C, muc_rsm03, Config) ->
  406:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  407: init_modules(C, muc_rsm04, Config) ->
  408:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  409: 
  410: init_modules(C, muc03, Config) ->
  411:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  412: init_modules(C, muc04, Config) ->
  413:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  414: 
  415: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  416:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  417:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  418:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  419:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  420:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  421:     Config;
  422: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  423:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  424:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  425:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  426:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  427:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  428:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  429:     Config;
  430: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  431:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm, simple]),
  432:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  433:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  434:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  435:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  436:     Config;
  437: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  438:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  439:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  440:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  441:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]),
  442:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  443:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  444:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  445:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  446:     Config;
  447: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  448:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  449:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  450:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  451:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  452:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  453:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  454:     Config;
  455: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  456:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  457:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  458:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  459:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  460:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  461:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  462:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  463:     Config;
  464: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  465:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  466:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  467:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  468:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]),
  469:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  470:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  471:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  472:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  473:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  474:     Config;
  475: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  476:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  477:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  478:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  479:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  480:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  481:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  482:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  483:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  484:     Config;
  485: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  486:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  487:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  489:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  490:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  491:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  492:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  493:     Config;
  494: 
  495: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  496:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  497:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  498:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  499:     Config;
  500: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  501:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  502:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  503:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  504:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  505:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  506:     Config;
  507: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc, Config) ->
  508:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [muc, simple]),
  509:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  510:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  511:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  512:     Config;
  513: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  514:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  515:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  516:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  517:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  518:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  519:     Config;
  520: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  521:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  522:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  523:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  524:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  525:     Config;
  526: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  527:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  528:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  529:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  530:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  531:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  532:     Config;
  533: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  534:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  535:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  536:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  537:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  538:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  539:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  540:     Config;
  541: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  542:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  543:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  544:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  545:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  546:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  547:     Config;
  548: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  549:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  550:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  551:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  552:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  553:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  554:     Config;
  555: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  556:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  557:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  558:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  559:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  560:     Config;
  561: init_modules(odbc_simple, _, Config) ->
  562:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  563:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, simple]),
  564:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  565:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  566:     Config;
  567: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  568:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  569:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  570:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  571:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  572:     Config;
  573: init_modules(odbc_async, _, Config) ->
  574:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  575:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  576:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), % 1ms
  577:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  578:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  579:     Config;
  580: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->
  581:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz, [pm, muc]),
  582:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm, muc]),
  583:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  584:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  585:     Config;
  586: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  587:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  588:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  589:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  590:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  591:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  592:     Config;
  593: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  594:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  595:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  596:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  597:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  598:     Config;
  599: init_modules(odbc_cache, _, Config) ->
  600:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  601:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  602:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  603:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  604:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  605:     Config;

  609:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  610:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  611:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  612:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  613:     Config;
  614: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->
  615:     skip;
  616: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, _, Config) ->
  617:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  618:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  619:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  620:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  621:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  622:     Config.
  623: 
  624: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  625:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  626:     Config.
  627: 
  628: mam_modules() ->
  629:     [mod_mam,
  630:      mod_mam_muc,
  631:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  632:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  633:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  634:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  635:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  636:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  637:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  638:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  639:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  640:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  641:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  642:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  643:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  644:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  645: 
  646: init_state(C, muc_rsm03, Config) ->
  647:     Config1 = init_state(C, muc_rsm, Config),
  648:     [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config1];
  649: init_state(C, muc_rsm04, Config) ->
  650:     Config1 = init_state(C, muc_rsm, Config),
  651:     [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config1];
  652: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  653:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  654:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  655:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  656:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  657: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  658:     Config;
  659: init_state(_, muc03, Config) ->
  660:     [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config];
  661: init_state(_, muc04, Config) ->
  662:     [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config];
  663: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  664:     Config;
  665: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  666:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  667: init_state(_, rsm03, Config) ->
  668:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}|Config],
  669:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  670: init_state(_, rsm04, Config) ->
  671:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}|Config],
  672:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  673: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  674:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  675:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  676: init_state(_, with_rsm03, Config) ->
  677:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config],
  678:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  679: init_state(_, with_rsm04, Config) ->
  680:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config],
  681:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  682: init_state(_, run_prefs_cases, Config) ->
  683:     clean_archives(Config);
  684: init_state(_, mam03, Config) ->
  685:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}|Config],
  686:     clean_archives(Config1);
  687: init_state(_, mam04, Config) ->
  688:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}|Config],
  689:     clean_archives(Config1);
  690: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  691:     clean_archives(Config).
  692: 
  693: mam03_props() ->
  694:     [{data_form, true},                 %% send data forms
  695:      {final_message, true},             %% expect final message with <fin/> inside
  696:      {result_format, mess_fin},         %% RSM is inside final message
  697:      {mam_ns, mam_ns_binary_v03()}].    %% v0.3 namespace
  698: 
  699: mam04_props() ->
  700:     [{data_form, true},                 %% send data forms
  701:      {result_format, iq_fin},           %% RSM is inside iq with <fin/> inside
  702:      {mam_ns, mam_ns_binary_v04()}].
  703: 
  704: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  705:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  706:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  707:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  708:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  709:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  710:                                        ],
  711:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  712:                  _ ->
  713:                      ConfigIn
  714:              end,
  715:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  716: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  717:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  718: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  719:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  720: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  721:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  722: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  723:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  724: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  725:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  726:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  727: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  728:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  729:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  730: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  731:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  732:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  733: init_per_testcase(C=nostore_hint, Config) ->
  734:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config); %% skip bootstrap & clean to safe time
  735: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  736:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  737:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  738: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  739:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  740:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  741: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  742:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  743: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  744:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  745: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  746:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  747: init_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  748:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  749: init_per_testcase(C=muc_deny_private_room_access, Config) ->
  750:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_private_room(Config));
  751: init_per_testcase(C=muc_allow_access_to_owner, Config) ->
  752:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_private_room(Config));
  753: init_per_testcase(C=muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  754:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_anonymous_room(Config));
  755: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  756:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  757:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  758: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  759:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  760: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  761:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  762: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  763:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  764: 
  765: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  766:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  767:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  768:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  769:         _ ->
  770:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  771:     end.
  772: 
  773: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  774:     destroy_room(Config),
  775:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  776: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  777:     destroy_room(Config),
  778:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  779: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  780:     destroy_room(Config),
  781:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  782: end_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  783:     destroy_room(Config),
  784:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  785: end_per_testcase(C=muc_deny_private_room_access, Config) ->
  786:     destroy_room(Config),
  787:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  788: end_per_testcase(C=muc_allow_access_to_owner, Config) ->
  789:     destroy_room(Config),
  790:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  791: end_per_testcase(C=muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  792:     destroy_room(Config),
  793:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  794: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  795:     destroy_room(Config),
  796:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  797: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  798:     destroy_room(Config),
  799:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  800: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  801:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  802: 
  803: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  804:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  805:     orelse
  806:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  807:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  808:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  809: 
  810: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  811:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  812: 
  813: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  814:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  815: 
  816: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  817:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  818:         non_existing -> ok;
  819:         false        -> ok;
  820:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  821:     end.
  822: 
  823: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  824:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  825:     ok.
  826: 
  827: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  828:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  829:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  830:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  831:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  832:     Result ->
  833:         Result
  834:     end.
  835: 
  836: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  837:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  838:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  839:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  840: 
  841: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  842: %% Group name helpers
  843: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  844: 
  845: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  846:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  847: 
  848: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  849: configuration(Group) ->
  850:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  851: 
  852: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  853: %% will be tested.
  854: %%
  855: %% Example:
  856: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  857: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  858: %% @end
  859: make_greedy(List) ->
  860:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  861: 
  862: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  863: basic_group(Group) ->
  864:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  865: 
  866: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  867:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  868:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  869:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  870: 
  871: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  872:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  873: 
  874: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  875:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  876:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  877:         true -> PrefixA;
  878:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  879:     end.
  880: 
  881: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  882:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  883: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  884:     Target.
  885: 
  886: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  887:     Tail.
  888: 
  889: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  890: %% Adhoc tests
  891: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  892: 
  893: %% Querying the archive for messages
  894: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  895:     P = ?config(props, ConfigIn),
  896:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  897:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  898:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  899:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  900:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  901:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  902:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  903:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  904:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  905:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  906:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
  907:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  908:         ok
  909:         end,
  910:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  911:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  912:                       ],
  913:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  914:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  915: 
  916: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  917:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  918:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  919:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  920:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  921: 
  922:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  923: 
  924:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  925:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID)),
  926:         assert_respond_size(P, CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  927:         ok
  928:         end,
  929:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  930: 
  931: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  932:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  933:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  934:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  935:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  936: 
  937:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  938: 
  939:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(P, <<>>),
  940:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  941:         assert_respond_size(P, MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  942: 
  943:         ok
  944:         end,
  945:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  946: 
  947: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  948:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  949:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  950:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  951:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  952: 
  953:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  954:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  955:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  956: 
  957:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID),
  958:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  959:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
  960: 
  961:         assert_respond_size(P, Len, Result),
  962:         ok
  963:         end,
  964:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  965: 
  966: archived(Config) ->
  967:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  968:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  969:         %% Archive must be empty.
  970:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  971:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  972: 
  973:         %% Bob receives a message.
  974:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  975:         try
  976:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  977:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  978:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  979:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  980:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  981: 
  982:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
  983: 
  984:         %% Bob calls archive.
  985:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  986:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
  987:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
  988:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  989:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
  990:         ok
  991:         catch Class:Reason ->
  992:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  993:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  994:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  995:         end
  996:         end,
  997:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  998: 
  999: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
 1000:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1001:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1002:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
 1003:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1004: 
 1005:         %% Bob receives a message.
 1006:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1007:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1008:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1009:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1010: 
 1011:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
 1012:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1013:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1014:         ok
 1015:         end,
 1016:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1017: 
 1018: strip_archived(Config) ->
 1019:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1020:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1021:         %% Archive must be empty.
 1022:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
 1023:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1024:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
 1025:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1026:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
 1027: 
 1028:         %% Bob receives a message.
 1029:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1030:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1031:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1032:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1033:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1034:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1035: 
 1036:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
 1037: 
 1038:         try
 1039:         %% Bob calls archive.
 1040:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1041:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1042:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1043:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1044:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1045:         ok
 1046:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1047:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1048:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
 1049:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1050:         end
 1051:         end,
 1052:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1053: 
 1054: respond_messages(#mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages}) ->
 1055:     Messages.
 1056: 
 1057: respond_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ}) ->
 1058:     IQ.
 1059: 
 1060: get_prop(Key, undefined) ->
 1061:     get_prop(Key, []);
 1062: get_prop(final_message, P) ->
 1063:     proplists:get_bool(final_message, P);
 1064: get_prop(result_format, P) ->
 1065:     proplists:get_value(result_format, P, iq_query);
 1066: get_prop(mam_ns, P) ->
 1067:     proplists:get_value(mam_ns, P, mam_ns_binary());
 1068: get_prop(data_form, P) ->
 1069:     proplists:get_bool(data_form, P).
 1070: 
 1071: wait_archive_respond(P, User) ->
 1072:     case get_prop(final_message, P) of
 1073:         true ->
 1074:             wait_archive_respond_fin(User);
 1075:         false ->
 1076:             wait_archive_respond_nofin(User)
 1077:     end.
 1078: 
 1079: wait_archive_respond_fin(User) ->
 1080:     %% rot1
 1081:     [IQ|MessagesAndFin] = wait_archive_respond_v03(User),
 1082:     [Fin|Messages] = lists:reverse(MessagesAndFin),
 1083:     #mam_archive_respond{
 1084:        respond_iq=IQ,
 1085:        respond_fin=Fin,
 1086:        respond_messages=lists:reverse(Messages)}.
 1087: 
 1088: wait_archive_respond_nofin(User) ->
 1089:     %% rot1
 1090:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond_v02(User)),
 1091:     #mam_archive_respond{
 1092:        respond_iq=IQ,
 1093:        respond_messages=lists:reverse(Messages)}.
 1094: 
 1095: %% MAM v0.2 respond
 1096: wait_archive_respond_v02(User) ->
 1097:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1098:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
 1099:         true ->
 1100:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
 1101:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
 1102:         false -> ok
 1103:     end,
 1104:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
 1105:         true  -> [S];
 1106:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond_v02(User)]
 1107:     end.
 1108: 
 1109: %% MAM v0.3 respond
 1110: wait_archive_respond_v03(User) ->
 1111:     IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1112:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(IQ) of
 1113:         true ->
 1114:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [IQ]),
 1115:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
 1116:         false -> ok
 1117:     end,
 1118:     escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1119:     [IQ|wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User)].
 1120: 
 1121: wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User) ->
 1122:     M = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1123:     escalus:assert(is_message, M),
 1124:     case is_final_message(M) of
 1125:         true ->
 1126:             [M];
 1127:         false ->
 1128:             [M|wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User)]
 1129:     end.
 1130: 
 1131: is_final_message(M) ->
 1132:     undefined =/= exml_query:subelement(M, <<"fin">>).
 1133: 
 1134: assert_respond_size(P, Size, Respond=#mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages})
 1135:       when length(Messages) =:= Size ->
 1136:     Respond;
 1137: assert_respond_size(P, ExpectedSize, #mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages}) ->
 1138:     RespondSize = length(Messages) - 1,
 1139:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
 1140:     %% void()
 1141: 
 1142: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
 1143: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
 1144: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
 1145: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
 1146: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
 1147: policy_violation(Config) ->
 1148:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1149:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1150:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1151:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
 1152:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 1153:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 1154:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
 1155:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
 1156:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
 1157:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1158:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
 1159:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"will_fail">>)),
 1160:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1161:         try
 1162:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
 1163:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
 1164:             ok
 1165:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1166:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1167:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
 1168:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1169:         end
 1170:         end,
 1171:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1172: 
 1173: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
 1174: offline_message(Config) ->
 1175:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
 1176:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1177:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1178:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
 1179:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1180:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
 1181:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1182:         ok
 1183:         end,
 1184:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
 1185: 
 1186:     %% Bob logs in
 1187:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
 1188: 
 1189:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
 1190:     %% will be delivered automatically.
 1191: 
 1192:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
 1193:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
 1194: 
 1195:     %% Bob checks his archive.
 1196:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1197:     ArcMsgs = R = respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1198:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1199: 
 1200:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
 1201: 
 1202: nostore_hint(Config) ->
 1203:     Msg = <<"So secret">>,
 1204:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1205:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1206:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob with a hint.
 1207:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1208:                      add_nostore_hint(escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg))),
 1209:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1210:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 1000),
 1211: 
 1212:         %% Bob checks his archive.
 1213:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1214:         ArcMsgs = R = respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1215:         assert_not_stored(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1216:         ok
 1217:         end,
 1218:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1219: 
 1220: purge_single_message(Config) ->
 1221:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1222:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1223:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1224:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1225:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1226:             [Mess] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1227:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
 1228:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1229:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1230:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1231:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1232:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1233:             assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1234:             ok
 1235:         end,
 1236:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1237: 
 1238: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
 1239:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1240:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1241:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1242:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1243:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
 1244:             AllMessages = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, AliceArchSize,
 1245:                 wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1246:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 1247:             %% Delete fifth message.
 1248:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
 1249:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1250:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1251:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1252:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1253:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
 1254:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1255:             assert_respond_size(P, AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1256:             ok
 1257:         end,
 1258:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1259: 
 1260: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1261:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1262:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1263:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1264:             [begin
 1265:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1266:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 1267:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1268:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1269:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1270:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1271:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1272:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1273:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1274:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1275:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1276:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1277:             assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1278:             ok
 1279:         end,
 1280:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1281: 
 1282: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1283:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1284:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1285:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1286:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1287:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1288:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1289:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1290: 
 1291:         %% Bob received presences.
 1292:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1293: 
 1294:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1295:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1296: 
 1297:         %% Alice sends another message to Bob.
 1298:         %% The message is not archived by the room.
 1299:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1300:         escalus:assert(is_message, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 1301: 
 1302:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1303: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1304: 
 1305:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1306:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1307:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1308:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1309:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1310:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1311:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1312:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1313:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1314:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1315: 
 1316:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1317: 
 1318:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1319:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1320:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1321:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1322:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1323:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1324:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1325:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1326:         ?assert_equal_extra(true, has_x_user_element(ArcMsg),
 1327:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1328:         ok
 1329:         end,
 1330:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1331: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1332: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1333:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1334:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1335:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1336:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1337:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1338:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1339:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1340: 
 1341:         %% Bob received presences.
 1342:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1343: 
 1344:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1345:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1346: 
 1347:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1348:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1349: 
 1350:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1351:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1352:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1353:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1354:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1355:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1356:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1357:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1358:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1359:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1360:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1361:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1362:         ok
 1363:     end,
 1364:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1365: 
 1366: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1367:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1368:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1369:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1370:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1371:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1372:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1373:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1374:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1375:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1376: 
 1377:         %% Alice received presences.
 1378:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1379:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1380: 
 1381:         %% Bob received presences.
 1382:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1383: 
 1384:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1385:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1386: 
 1387:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1388:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1389:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1390: 
 1391:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1392: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1393: 
 1394:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1395:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1396:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1397: 
 1398:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1399:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1400: 
 1401:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1402:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1403:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1404: 
 1405:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1406:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1407:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1408:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1409:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1410:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1411:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1412:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1413:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1414:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1415: 
 1416:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1417: 
 1418:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1419: 
 1420:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1421: 
 1422:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1423:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1424:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1425:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1426:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1427:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1428:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1429:         ok
 1430:         end,
 1431:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1432: 
 1433: muc_private_message(Config) ->
 1434:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1435:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1436:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1437:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1438:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1439:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1440: 
 1441:         %% Bob received presences.
 1442:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1443: 
 1444:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1445:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1446: 
 1447:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1448:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1449:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1450:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1451: 
 1452:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1453:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1454:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1455: 
 1456:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1457:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1458:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1459:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1460:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1461:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1462: 
 1463:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1464:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1465:         assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1466:         ok
 1467:         end,
 1468:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1469: 
 1470: muc_deny_private_room_access(Config) ->
 1471:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1472:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1473:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1474:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1475:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1476:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1477:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1478: 
 1479:         %% mod_muc returns error presence.
 1480:         Err1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1481:         escalus_assert:is_error(Err1, <<"auth">>, <<"not-authorized">>),
 1482: 
 1483:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1484: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1485: 
 1486:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1487:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1488:         Err2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1489:         %% mod_mam_muc returns error iq.
 1490:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"not-allowed">>], Err2),
 1491:         ok
 1492:         end,
 1493:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1494: 
 1495: %% @doc Allow access to non-in-room users who able to connect
 1496: muc_allow_access_to_owner(Config) ->
 1497:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1498:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1499:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1500:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1501: 
 1502:         %% Alice (not in room) requests the room's archive.
 1503:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1504:         %% mod_mam_muc returns result.
 1505:         assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1506:         ok
 1507:         end,
 1508:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1509: 
 1510: muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms(Config) ->
 1511:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1512:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1513:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1514:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1515:         Text = <<"Hi all!">>,
 1516:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1517:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1518: 
 1519:         %% Bob received presences.
 1520:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1521: 
 1522:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1523:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1524: 
 1525:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1526: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1527: 
 1528:         %% Bob receives the message.
 1529:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1530:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1531: 
 1532:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1533:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1534: 
 1535:         %% mod_mam_muc returns result.
 1536:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1537: 
 1538:         ?assert_equal_extra(false, has_x_user_element(ArcMsg),
 1539:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1540:         ok
 1541:         end,
 1542:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1543: 
 1544: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1545: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1546:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1547:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1548:         %% Send
 1549:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1550:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1551:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1552:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1553:         %%   </query>
 1554:         %% </iq>
 1555:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request(P)),
 1556:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1557:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1558:         ok
 1559:         end,
 1560:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1561: 
 1562: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1563:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1564:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1565:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1566:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1567:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1568:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1569:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1570:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1571:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1572:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1573:         %% Send
 1574:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1575:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1576:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1577:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1578:         %%   </query>
 1579:         %% </iq>
 1580:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(P, StartTime, StopTime)),
 1581:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1582:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 1583:         IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 1584:         [M1,M2|_] = respond_messages(Result),
 1585:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1586:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1587:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1588:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1589:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1590:         ok
 1591:         end,
 1592:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1593: 
 1594: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1595:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1596:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1597:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1598:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1599: 
 1600: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1601: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1602: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1603:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1604:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1605:         %% Send
 1606:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1607:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1608:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1609:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1610:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1611:         %%       </set>
 1612:         %%   </query>
 1613:         %% </iq>
 1614:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request(P)),
 1615:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 1616:         Msgs = respond_messages(Result),
 1617:         IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 1618:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1619:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1620:         ok
 1621:         end,
 1622:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1623: 
 1624: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1625:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1626:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1627:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1628:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1629: 
 1630:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1631:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1632:         wait_empty_rset(P, Alice, 15)
 1633:         end,
 1634:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1635: 
 1636: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1637:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1638:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1639:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1640:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1641:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1642:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1643:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 5),
 1644:         ok
 1645:         end,
 1646:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1647: 
 1648: pagination_first5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1649:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1650:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1651:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1652:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1653:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1654:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1655:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 5),
 1656:         ok
 1657:         end,
 1658:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1659: 
 1660: pagination_first25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1661:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1662:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1663:         %% Get the first page of size 25.
 1664:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25},
 1665:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1666:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1667:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 15),
 1668:         ok
 1669:         end,
 1670:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1671: 
 1672: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 1673:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1674:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1675:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1676:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before},
 1677:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1678:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5">>, RSM)),
 1679:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 11, 15),
 1680:         ok
 1681:         end,
 1682:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1683: 
 1684: pagination_last5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1685:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1686:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1687:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1688:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1689:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1690:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1691:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 11, 15),
 1692:         ok
 1693:         end,
 1694:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1695: 
 1696: pagination_last25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1697:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1698:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1699:         %% Get the last page of size 25.
 1700:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1701:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1702:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
