 1705:         end,
 1706:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1707: 
 1708: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1709:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1710:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1711:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1712:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1713:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1714:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1715:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 6, 10),
 1716:         ok
 1717:         end,
 1718:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1719: 
 1720: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1721:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1722:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1723:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1724:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1725:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1726:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1727:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 6, 15),
 1728:         ok
 1729:         end,
 1730:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1731: 
 1732: 
 1733: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1734:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1735:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1736:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1737:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1738:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1739:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1740:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 5, 9),
 1741:         ok
 1742:         end,
 1743:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1744: 
 1745: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1746:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1747:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1748:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1749:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config), simple=true},
 1750:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1751:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1752:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1753:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1754:         ok
 1755:         end,
 1756:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1757: 
 1758: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1759:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1760:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1761:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1762:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after', id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1763:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1764:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"after10">>, RSM)),
 1765:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 11, 15),
 1766:         ok
 1767:         end,
 1768:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1769: 
 1770: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1771: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1772: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1773:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1774:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1775:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1776:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1777:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1778:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1779:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1780:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1781:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1782:         ok
 1783:         end,
 1784:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1785: 
 1786: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1787: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1788:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1789:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1790:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1791:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1792:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1793:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1794:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1795:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1796:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1797:         ok
 1798:         end,
 1799:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1800: 
 1801: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1802:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1803: 
 1804: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1805:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1806:         true ->
 1807:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1808:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1809:         _ ->
 1810:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1811:     end.
 1812: 
 1813: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1814:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1815:         true ->
 1816:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1817:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1818:         _ ->
 1819:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1820:     end.
 1821: 
 1822: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1823:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1824:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1825:         %% Send
 1826:         %%
 1827:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1828:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1829:         %%     <always>
 1830:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1831:         %%     </always>
 1832:         %%     <never>
 1833:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1834:         %%     </never>
 1835:         %%   </prefs>
 1836:         %% </iq>
 1837:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1838:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1839:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1840:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1841: 
 1842:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1843:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1844: 
 1845:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1846:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1847:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1848:         ok
 1849:         end,
 1850:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1851: 
 1852: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1853: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1854: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1855: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1856: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1857:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1858:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1859:         %% Send
 1860:         %%
 1861:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1862:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1863:         %%     <always>
 1864:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1865:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1866:         %%     </always>
 1867:         %%   </prefs>
 1868:         %% </iq>
 1869:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1870:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1871:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1872:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1873:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1874: 
 1875:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1876:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1877: 
 1878:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1879:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1880:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1881:         ok
 1882:         end,
 1883:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1884: 
 1885: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1886:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1887:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1888:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1889:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1890:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1891:         try
 1892:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1893:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1894:         ok
 1895:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1896:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1897:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1898:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1899:         end
 1900:         end,
 1901:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1902: 
 1903: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 1904: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1905:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1906:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1907:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 1908:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1909:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 1910:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1911:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 1912:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 1913:         ok
 1914:         end,
 1915:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1916: 
 1917: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1918: %% Helpers
 1919: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1920: 
 1921: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 1922: 
 1923: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 1924: mam_ns_binary_v03() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:0">>.
 1925: mam_ns_binary_v04() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:1">>.
 1926: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 1927: 
 1928: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 1929:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1930:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1931:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 1932:     }]).
 1933: 
 1934: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 1935:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1936:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1937:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 1938:        children = skip_undefined([
 1939:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1940:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1941:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 1942:     }]).
 1943: 
 1944: 
 1945: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 1946:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 1947: 
 1948: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 1949:     [];
 1950: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 1951:     [{K, V}].
 1952: 
 1953: mam_ns_attr(P) ->
 1954:     [{<<"xmlns">>,get_prop(mam_ns, P)}].
 1955: 
 1956: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 1957:     undefined;
 1958: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 1959:     #xmlel{
 1960:         name = <<"start">>,
 1961:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BStart}}.
 1962: 
 1963: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 1964:     undefined;
 1965: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 1966:     #xmlel{
 1967:         name = <<"end">>,
 1968:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BEnd}}.
 1969: 
 1970: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 1971:     undefined;
 1972: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 1973:     #xmlel{
 1974:         name = <<"with">>,
 1975:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}}.
 1976: 
 1977: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 1978: %% a certain query.
 1979: stanza_archive_request(P, QueryId) ->
 1980:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId,
 1981:                               undefined, undefined,
 1982:                               undefined, undefined).
 1983: 
 1984: stanza_date_range_archive_request(P) ->
 1985:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined,
 1986:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 1987:                               undefined, undefined).
 1988: 
 1989: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(P, Start, Stop) ->
 1990:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined,
 1991:                               Start, Stop,
 1992:                               undefined, undefined).
 1993: 
 1994: stanza_limit_archive_request(P) ->
 1995:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 1996:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 1997: 
 1998: stanza_page_archive_request(P, QueryId, RSM) ->
 1999:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 2000: 
 2001: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID) ->
 2002:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined, undefined,
 2003:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 2004: 
 2005: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2006:     case get_prop(data_form, P) of
 2007:         false ->
 2008:             stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v02(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM);
 2009:         true ->
 2010:             stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v03(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM)
 2011:     end.
 2012: 
 2013: stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v03(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2014:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2015:        name = <<"query">>,
 2016:        attrs = mam_ns_attr(P)
 2017:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId),
 2018:        children = skip_undefined([
 2019:            form_x(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM),
 2020:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 2021:     }]).
 2022: 
 2023: 
 2024: form_x(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2025:     #xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
 2026:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"jabber:x:data">>}],
 2027:            children = skip_undefined([
 2028:                 form_field(<<"start">>, BStart),
 2029:                 form_field(<<"end">>, BEnd),
 2030:                 form_field(<<"with">>, BWithJID)]
 2031:                 ++ form_extra_fields(RSM)
 2032:                 ++ form_border_fields(RSM))}.
 2033: 
 2034: form_extra_fields(undefined) ->
 2035:     [];
 2036: form_extra_fields(#rsm_in{simple=Simple, opt_count=OptCount}) ->
 2037:     [form_bool_field(<<"simple">>, Simple),
 2038:      form_bool_field(<<"opt_count">>, OptCount)].
 2039: 
 2040: form_border_fields(undefined) ->
 2041:     [];
 2042: form_border_fields(#rsm_in{
 2043:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 2044:     [form_field(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId),
 2045:      form_field(<<"after_id">>, AfterId),
 2046:      form_field(<<"from_id">>, FromId),
 2047:      form_field(<<"to_id">>, ToId)].
 2048: 
 2049: form_type_field(MamNs) ->
 2050:     form_field(<<"FORM_TYPE">>, MamNs).
 2051: 
 2052: form_field(VarName, undefined) ->
 2053:     undefined;
 2054: form_field(VarName, VarValue) ->
 2055:     #xmlel{name = <<"field">>, attrs = [{<<"var">>, VarName}],
 2056:            children = [#xmlel{name = <<"value">>,
 2057:                               children = [#xmlcdata{content = VarValue}]}]}.
 2058: 
 2059: form_bool_field(Name, true) ->
 2060:     form_field(Name, <<"true">>);
 2061: form_bool_field(Name, _) ->
 2062:     undefined.
 2063: 
 2064: 
 2065: stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v02(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2066:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 2067:        name = <<"query">>,
 2068:        attrs = mam_ns_attr(P)
 2069:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 2070:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 2071:        children = skip_undefined([
 2072:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 2073:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 2074:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 2075:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 2076:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 2077:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 2078:     }]).
 2079: 
 2080: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 2081:     [#xmlel{name = <<"simple">>}];
 2082: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 2083:     [].
 2084: 
 2085: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 2086:     [#xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>}];
 2087: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 2088:     [].
 2089: 
 2090: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 2091:     [];
 2092: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 2093:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 2094:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 2095:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 2096:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 2097:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 2098: 
 2099: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 2100:     undefined;
 2101: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 2102:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 2103:            children = skip_undefined([
 2104:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 2105:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 2106:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 2107: 
 2108: maybe_rsm_id(undefined) -> [];
 2109: maybe_rsm_id(Id) -> #xmlcdata{content = Id}.
 2110: 
 2111: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 2112:     undefined;
 2113: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 2114:     #xmlel{
 2115:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 2116:         children = maybe_rsm_id(Id)}.
 2117: 
 2118: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 2119:     undefined;
 2120: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 2121:     #xmlel{
 2122:         name = <<"index">>,
 2123:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}}.
 2124: 
 2125: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 2126:     undefined;
 2127: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 2128:     #xmlel{
 2129:         name = <<"max">>,
 2130:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}}.
 2131: 
 2132: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 2133:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 2134:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 2135:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 2136:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 2137: 
 2138: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 2139:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 2140:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 2141:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 2142: 
 2143: assert_not_stored(Archived, Sent) ->
 2144:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 2145:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 2146:     ?assert_equal(0, erlang:length(Same)).
 2147: 
 2148: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 2149:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 2150:     A =:= Raw.
 2151: 
 2152: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 2153: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 2154: 
 2155: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs) ->
 2156:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 2157:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 2158:     NeverEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 2159:                       children = encode_jids(NeverJIDs)},
 2160:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2161:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 2162:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 2163:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 2164:        children = [AlwaysEl, NeverEl]
 2165:     }]).
 2166: 
 2167: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 2168:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 2169:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 2170:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 2171:     }]).
 2172: 
 2173: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 2174: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 2175:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 2176: 
 2177: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 2178:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 2179: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 2180:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 2181:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 2182: 
 2183: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 2184: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 2185: 
 2186: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 2187:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 2188:     M = #forwarded_message{
 2189:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2190:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 2191:         has_x_user_element = false},
 2192:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 2193: 
 2194: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 2195:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 2196:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 2197:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 2198:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 2199:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2200:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 2201: 
 2202: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
 2203:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 2204:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 2205: 
 2206: 
 2207: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 2208:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 2209:     M#forwarded_message{
 2210:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2211:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 2212: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 2213:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 2214:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 2215:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 2216:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 2217:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2218:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 2219:                 M1, Children).
 2220: 
 2221: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 2222:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 2223:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 2224: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
 2225:         attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 2226:     IsUser = lists:member({<<"xmlns">>, <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc#user">>}, Attrs),
 2227:     M#forwarded_message{has_x_user_element = IsUser};
 2228: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 2229: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 2230:     M.
 2231: 
 2232: %% Num is 1-based.
 2233: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 2234:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 2235:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 2236:     Id.
 2237: 
 2238: 
 2239: %% @doc Result query iq.
 2240: %%
 2241: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 2242: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 2243: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 2244: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 2245: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 2246: %%     []}]
 2247: %%
 2248: %%
 2249: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 2250: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 2251: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 2252: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 2253: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 2254: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 2255: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 2256: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 2257: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 2258: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 2259: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 2260: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 2261: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 2262: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 2263: parse_result_iq(P, Result) ->
 2264:     case get_prop(result_format, P) of
 2265:         mess_fin ->
 2266:             parse_fin_and_iq(Result);
 2267:         iq_query ->
 2268:             parse_legacy_iq(respond_iq(Result));
 2269:         iq_fin ->
 2270:             parse_fin_iq(Result)
 2271:     end.
 2272: 
 2273: %% MAM v0.3
 2274: parse_fin_and_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ, respond_fin=FinMsg}) ->
 2275:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(FinMsg, <<"fin">>),
 2276:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2277:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set).
 2278: 
 2279: %% MAM v0.4
 2280: parse_fin_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ, respond_fin=undefined}) ->
 2281:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(IQ, <<"fin">>),
 2282:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2283:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set).
 2284: 
 2285: %% MAM v0.2
 2286: parse_legacy_iq(IQ) ->
 2287:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(IQ, <<"query">>),
 2288:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2289:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set).
 2290: 
 2291: parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set) ->
 2292:     #result_iq{
 2293:         from        = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"from">>),
 2294:         to          = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"to">>),
 2295:         id          = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"id">>),
 2296:         first       = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, cdata]),
 2297:         first_index = maybe_binary_to_integer(exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, {attr, <<"index">>}])),
 2298:         last        = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"last">>}, cdata]),
 2299:         count       = maybe_binary_to_integer(exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"count">>}, cdata]))}.
 2300: 
 2301: 
 2302: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 2303: 
 2304: 
 2305: 
 2306: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 2307:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 2308:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2309: 
 2310: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 2311:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 2312:                            IQ) ->
 2313:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 2314:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 2315:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 2316: 
 2317: 
 2318: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 2319:                                         children = Children},
 2320:                                  IQ) ->
 2321:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 2322: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 2323:                                         children = Children},
 2324:                                  IQ) ->
 2325:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 2326: 
 2327: 
 2328: parse_jids(Els) ->
 2329:     [escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(JID) %% MongooseIM normalizes JIDs
 2330:      || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 2331: 
 2332: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 2333: %%   <error type='modify'>
 2334: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 2335: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 2336: %%   </error>
 2337: %% </iq>
 2338: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 2339:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 2340: 
 2341:     IQ = #error_iq{
 2342:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 2343:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2344:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2345: 
 2346: 
 2347: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 2348:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 2349:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 2350:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2351:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 2352: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 2353:     IQ.
 2354: 
 2355: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 2356:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 2357:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 2358: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 2359:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 2360: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 2361:     IQ.
 2362: 
 2363: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2364: %% Helpers (muc)
 2365: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2366: 
 2367: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 2368:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 2369:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 2370:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 2371:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 2372:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 2373: 
 2374: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 2375:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 2376:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2377:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2378:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2379:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}, {anonymous, false}]).
 2380: 
 2381: start_alice_private_room(Config) ->
 2382:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2383:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2384:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2385:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick,
 2386:                [{persistent, true},
 2387:                 {password_protected, true},
 2388:                 {password, <<"secret">>}]).
 2389: 
 2390: start_alice_anonymous_room(Config) ->
 2391:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2392:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2393:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2394:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{anonymous, true}]).
 2395: 
 2396: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 2397:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 2398:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 2399:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 2400:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 2401: 
 2402: destroy_room(Config) ->
 2403:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 2404:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 2405:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 2406:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 2407:         _ -> ok
 2408:     end.
 2409: 
 2410: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 2411:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 2412:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 2413:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 2414:                    Room, Nick).
 2415: 
 2416: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 2417:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 2418: 
 2419: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 2420:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 2421: 
 2422: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 2423:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 2424: 
 2425: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 2426:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 2427: 
 2428: 
 2429: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2430:     Pid = self(),
 2431:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2432:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 2433:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2434:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2435:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2436:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2437: 
 2438:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2439:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2440: 
 2441:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2442:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2443:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2444:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2445:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2446:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2447:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2448: 
 2449:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2450: 
 2451:         %% Get whole history.
 2452:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2453:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2454:         AllMessages =
 2455:             respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 15, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 2456:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2457:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2458:         ok
 2459:         end,
 2460:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2461:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2462:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2463:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2464: 
 2465:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2466:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2467: 
 2468: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2469:     Pid = self(),
 2470:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2471:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2472:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2473:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2474:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2475:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2476:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2477:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2478:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2479:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2480:         %% Get whole history.
 2481:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"all_messages">>)),
 2482:         AllMessages =
 2483:             respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 15, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 2484:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2485:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2486:         ok
 2487:         end,
 2488:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2489:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2490:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2491:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2492: 
 2493:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2494:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2495: 
 2496: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2497:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2498: 
 2499: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2500:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2501:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2502: 
 2503: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2504:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2505:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2506:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2507:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2508:     %% Retry 10 times if not empty
 2509:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U, 10) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2510:     Config.
 2511: 
 2512: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2513:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2514:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2515:     %% Retry 10 times if not empty
 2516:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room, 10),
 2517:     Config.
 2518: 
 2519: serv_users(Config) ->
 2520:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2521:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2522: 
 2523: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2524:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2525:     {Server, Username}.
 2526: 
 2527: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2528: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username, RetryTimes) when is_integer(RetryTimes) -> 
 2529:     %% Wait for zero messages in archive
 2530:     case wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, 0) of
 2531:        0 -> ok;
 2532:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, {actual_size, X}})
 2533:     end.
 2534: 
 2535: wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, _RetryTimes=0, _ExpectedSize) ->
 2536:     archive_size(Server, Username);
 2537: wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) when RetryTimes > 0 ->
 2538:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2539:         ExpectedSize ->
 2540:             ExpectedSize;
 2541:         _ActualSize ->
 2542:             %% Wait and retry
 2543:             timer:sleep(100),
 2544:             wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes-1, ExpectedSize)
 2545:     end.
 2546: 
 2547: wait_for_archive_size_or_warning(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) ->
 2548:     case wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) of
 2549:         ExpectedSize -> ok;
 2550:         ActualSize ->
 2551:             ct:pal("issue=wait_for_archive_size_or_warning, expected_size=~p, actual_size=~p",
 2552:                    [ExpectedSize, ActualSize])
 2553:     end.
 2554: 
 2555: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2556: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username, RetryTimes) ->
 2557:     %% Wait for zero messages in archive
 2558:     case wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, 0) of
 2559:        0 -> ok;
 2560:        X -> ct:fail({room_not_empty, Server, Username, {actual_size, X}})
 2561:     end.
 2562: 
 2563: wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, _RetryTimes=0, _ExpectedSize) ->
 2564:     room_archive_size(Server, Username);
 2565: wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) when RetryTimes > 0 ->
 2566:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2567:         ExpectedSize ->
 2568:             ExpectedSize;
 2569:         _ActualSize ->
 2570:             %% Wait and retry
 2571:             timer:sleep(100),
 2572:             wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes-1, ExpectedSize)
 2573:     end.
 2574: 
 2575: 
 2576: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2577:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2578: 
 2579: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2580:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2581: 
 2582: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2583:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2584: 
 2585: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2586:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2587: 
 2588: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2589:     %% Do not care
 2590:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2591:     ok.
 2592: 
 2593: wait_message_range(P, Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2594:     wait_message_range(P, Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2595: 
 2596: wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2597:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Client),
 2598:     Messages = respond_messages(Result),
 2599:     IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 2600:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2601:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2602:     try
 2603:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2604:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2605:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2606:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2607:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2608:         ok
 2609:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2610:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2611:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2612:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2613:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2614:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2615:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2616:     end.
 2617: 
 2618: 
 2619: wait_empty_rset(P, Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2620:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 2621:     IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 2622:     ?assert_equal([], respond_messages(Result)),
 2623:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2624:     try
 2625:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2626:         ok
 2627:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2628:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2629:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2630:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2631:     end.
 2632: 
 2633: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2634:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2635:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2636:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2637:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2638:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2639:     end.
 2640: 
 2641: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2642:     random:seed(now()),
 2643:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2644:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2645:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2646:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2647:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2648:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2649:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2650:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2651:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2652:     AllUsers = [{Domain, <<"alice">>}, {Domain, <<"bob">>}, {Domain, <<"carol">>}],
 2653:     wait_for_msgs(Msgs, AllUsers),
 2654: 
 2655:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2656: 
 2657: %% Wait for messages to be written
 2658: wait_for_msgs(Msgs, Users) ->
 2659:     UsersCnt = [{S, U, count_msgs(Msgs, S, U)} || {S, U} <- Users],
 2660:     [wait_for_archive_size_or_warning(S, U, 10, C) || {S, U, C} <- UsersCnt],
 2661:     ok.
 2662: 
 2663: count_msgs(Msgs, S, U) ->
 2664:     Bin = <<U/binary, "@", S/binary>>,
 2665:     length([1 ||
 2666:             {_,
 2667:              {FromBin, _FromJID, _FromArcID},
 2668:              {ToBin, _ToJID, _ToArcID}, _, _Packet} <- Msgs,
 2669:            FromBin =:= Bin orelse ToBin =:= Bin]).
 2670: 
 2671: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2672:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2673:         ID1 =< ID2
 2674:     end,
 2675:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2676: 
 2677: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2678:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2679:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2680:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2681:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2682:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2683: 
 2684: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2685:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2686: 
 2687:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2688:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2689: 
 2690: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2691:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2692:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2693:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2694:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2695:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2696:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2697:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2698: 
 2699: random_time() ->
 2700:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2701:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2702:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2703: 
 2704: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2705:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2706:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2707:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2708:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2709: 
 2710: 
 2711: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2712:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2713: 
 2714: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2715:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2716:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2717:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2718:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2719:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2720:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2721: 
 2722: archive_message(Args) ->
 2723:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2724: 
 2725: 
 2726: 
 2727: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2728:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2729: 
 2730:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2731:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2732:     R = room_address(Room),
 2733: 
 2734:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2735:     Host = host(),
 2736:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2737:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2738:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2739:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2740:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2741:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2742:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2743:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2744: 
 2745:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2746: 
 2747:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2748: 
 2749:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2750: 
 2751: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2752:     Host = host(),
 2753:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2754: 
 2755: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2756:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2757:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2758:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2759:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2760: 
 2761: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2762: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2763:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2764:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2765: 
 2766: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2767:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2768: 
 2769: 
 2770: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2771:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2772: 
 2773: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2774:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2775:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2776:         Other ->
 2777:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2778:             false
 2779:     end.
 2780: 
 2781: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2782:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2783:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2784:             true;
 2785:         _ ->
 2786:             false
 2787:     end.
 2788: 
 2789: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2790:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2791: 
 2792: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2793:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2794:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2795:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2796:     Client.
 2797: 
 2798: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2799:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2800:         undefined ->
 2801:             ok;
 2802:         Value ->
 2803:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2804:     end.
 2805: 
 2806: 
 2807: %% Bob and Alice are friends.
 2808: %% Kate and Alice are not friends.
 2809: %%
 2810: %% Messages:
 2811: %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2812: %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2813: %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2814: %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2815: %%
 2816: %% Each tuple is
 2817: %% {{Default, Always, Never},
 2818: %%  [Message1Archived, Message2Archived, Message3Archied, Message4Archived]}
 2819: prefs_cases2() ->
 2820:     [
 2821:      {{roster, [], []},              [true, true, false, false]},
 2822:      {{roster, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2823:      {{roster, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2824:      {{roster, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2825:  
 2826:      {{roster, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2827:      {{roster, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2828:      {{roster, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2829:  
 2830:  
 2831:      {{never, [], []},              [false, false, false, false]},
 2832:      {{never, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2833:      {{never, [kate], []},          [false, false, true, true]},
 2834:      {{never, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2835:  
 2836:      {{never, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2837:      {{never, [], [kate]},          [false, false, false, false]},
 2838:      {{never, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2839:  
 2840:  
 2841:      {{always, [], []},              [true, true, true, true]},
 2842:      {{always, [bob], []},           [true, true, true, true]},
 2843:      {{always, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2844:      {{always, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2845:  
 2846:      {{always, [], [bob]},           [false, false, true, true]},
 2847:      {{always, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2848:      {{always, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]}
 2849:     ].
 2850: 
 2851: %% First write all messages, than read and check
 2852: run_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2853:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2854:     F = fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 2855:         make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob),
 2856:         %% Just send messages for each prefs configuration
 2857:         Funs = [run_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases2()],
 2858: 
 2859:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2860: 
 2861:         %% Get ALL messages using several queries if required
 2862:         Stanzas = get_all_messages(P, Alice),
 2863:         ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Stanzas),
 2864:         Bodies = [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages],
 2865: 
 2866:         %% Check messages, print out all failed cases
 2867:         Fails = lists:append([Fun(Bodies) || Fun <- Funs]),
 2868:         %% If fails consult with ct:pal/2 why
 2869:         ?assert_equal([], Fails)
 2870:         end,
 2871:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], F).
 2872: 
 2873: make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob) ->
 2874:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2875:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set
 2876:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % presence subscribe
 2877: 
 2878:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2879:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3, 5000), % iq set, presence subscribed, presence
 2880:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2881: 
 2882:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2883:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000), % iq set subscription=to, presence subscribe
 2884:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2885: 
 2886:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2887:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=both
 2888:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3, 5000), % iq set subscription=both, presence subscribed, presence
 2889:         ok.
 2890: 
 2891: run_prefs_case({PrefsState, ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) ->
 2892:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2893:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2894:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2895:     Messages = [iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("n=~p, prefs=~p, now=~p",
 2896:                                                [N, PrefsState, now()]))
 2897:                 || N <- [1,2,3,4]],
 2898:     %% Messages:
 2899:     %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2900:     %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2901:     %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2902:     %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2903:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(1, Messages))),
 2904:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, lists:nth(2, Messages))),
 2905:     escalus:send(Kate, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(3, Messages))),
 2906:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Kate, lists:nth(4, Messages))),
 2907:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000),
 2908:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 1, 5000),
 2909:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000),
 2910:     %% Delay check
 2911:     fun(Bodies) ->
 2912:         ActualMessageStates = [lists:member(M, Bodies) || M <- Messages],
 2913:         ?_assert_equal_extra(ExpectedMessageStates, ActualMessageStates,
 2914:                              [{prefs_state, PrefsState}])
 2915:     end.
 2916: 
 2917: get_last_four_messages(P, Alice) ->
 2918:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=4, direction='before'},
 2919:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last4_rsm">>, RSM)),
 2920:     respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)).
 2921: 
 2922: get_all_messages(P, Alice) ->
 2923:     get_all_messages(P, Alice, undefined).
 2924: 
 2925: get_all_messages(P, Alice, Id) ->
 2926:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=50, direction='after', id=Id},
 2927:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"page_rsm">>, RSM)),
 2928:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 2929:     PageMessages = respond_messages(Result),
 2930:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2931:     #result_iq{last=LastId} = ParsedIQ,
 2932:     case PageMessages of
 2933:         [] ->
 2934:             [];
 2935:         [_|_] ->
 2936:             PageMessages ++ get_all_messages(P, Alice, LastId)
 2937:     end.
 2938: 
 2939: stanza_prefs_set_request({DefaultMode, AlwaysUsers, NeverUsers}, Config) ->
 2940:     DefaultModeBin = atom_to_binary(DefaultMode, utf8),
 2941:     AlwaysJIDs = users_to_jids(AlwaysUsers, Config),
 2942:     NeverJIDs  = users_to_jids(NeverUsers, Config),
 2943:     stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultModeBin, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs).
 2944: 
 2945: users_to_jids(Users, Config) ->
 2946:     [escalus_users:get_jid(Config, User) || User <- Users].
 2947: 
 2948: print_configuration_not_supported(C, B) ->
 2949:     I = io_lib:format("issue=configuration_not_supported, "
 2950:                        "configuration=~p, basic_group=~p", [C, B]),
 2951:      binary_to_list(iolist_to_binary(I)).
 2952: 
 2953: %% The same as prefs_set_request case but for different configurations
 2954: run_set_and_get_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2955:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2956:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 2957:         [run_set_and_get_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases2()]
 2958:         end,
 2959:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 2960: 
 2961: %% Alice sets and gets her preferences
 2962: run_set_and_get_prefs_case({PrefsState, _ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Config) ->
 2963:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2964:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2965:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 2966: 
 2967:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 2968:     ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2969: 
 2970:     ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 2971:     ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 2972:     ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 2973:     ok.
 2974: 
 2975: maybe_binary_to_integer(B) when is_binary(B) ->
 2976:     list_to_integer(binary_to_list(B));
 2977: maybe_binary_to_integer(undefined) ->
 2978:     undefined.
 2979: 
 2980: add_nostore_hint(#xmlel{children=Children}=Elem) ->
 2981:     Elem#xmlel{children=Children ++ [nostore_hint_elem()]}.
 2982: 
 2983: nostore_hint_elem() ->
 2984:     #xmlel{name = <<"no-store">>, attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"urn:xmpp:hints">>}]}.
 2985: 
 2986: has_x_user_element(ArcMsg) ->
 2987:     ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 2988:     ParsedMess#forwarded_message.has_x_user_element.
